item.title: Courses for Spring 2019
item.description: At least the following courses counting towards the Minor will be offered. There may be others: courses we missed when checking the Bulletin, and courses courses that can count despite not being listed in the Bulletinâ€”especially new offerings and special topics courses. Philosophy of Science PHI 152 (QR) Scientific Reasoning There may or may not be a Scientific Method.
